text: It alleged: Phones were being tapped and going out of action; Police were visiting people "on no pretext whatsoever, except to pass the time of day; Supporters had been warned- one that his connection with the committee was going too far; another that anti-apartheid agitation was all right, but support for the committee was not.
handwritten_text: It alleged: Phones were being tapped and going out of action; Police were visiting people "on no pretext whatsoever, except to pass the time of day; Supporters had been warned- one that his connection with the committee was going too far; another that anti-apartheid agitation was all right, but support for the committee was not.
